plugins.name: Kittl Templates
plugins.description:
Design should feel fluid. Fast. Inspiring. Not like you're wrestling with ten panels just to move some text around.


That’s why Kittl exists—to give you powerful design tools that feel intuitive yet still deliver professional results.


If you’ve worked with design software before, you’ll find Kittl refreshingly familiar—but way less rigid. This guide will walk you through the essentials, from setting up your first project to using advanced features like text transformations, vector exports, and built-in AI tools.


From personal projects to commercial work, Kittl gives you the flexibility and control to bring your ideas to life—without the friction.

accepted.name: Pawel
accepted.description: Product Designer, playing with JS. Figma plugin for generating NFTs.

plugins.tagline: Explore over 1,000 graphic design templates to spark your creativity

plugins.name: PDF Pro For Figma - Version Lite
plugins.description:
[EN-US]


📄 PDF Pro for Figma – Lite

Export PDF files with clickable links — both between Figma pages (frames) and to external websites, merge all frames into a single PDF.


✅ What this plugin does:


  1. Automatically detects prototype connections
  2. Creates links between Figma frames in the PDF
  3. Lets you select multiple frames and combine them into a single PDF
  4. Lets you add table of contents, menus, and buttons with links
  5. Keeps external links working
  6. Limit of up to 3 pages per export
  7. Easy to use, right inside Figma


🚀 Need more features?

Unlock the PRO version to:


  1. Export documents with unlimited pages
  2. Generate full PDFs with no restrictions


Help us by donating

👉 Get the PRO version



[PT-BR]


Exporte arquivos PDF com links clicáveis — tanto entre páginas do Figma (frames) quanto para sites externos, junte todos os frames em um único PDF.


✅ O que o plugin faz:


  1. Detecta automaticamente conexões de protótipo
  2. Cria links entre páginas (frames) no PDF
  3. Permite selecionar vários frames e gerar um único arquivo PDF
  4. Permite adicionar sumário, menus e botões com links
  5. Mantém links para sites externos funcionando
  6. Limite de até 3 páginas por exportação
  7. Fácil de usar, direto no Figma


🚀 Quer mais funcionalidades?

Desbloqueie a versão PRO para:


  1. Exportar documentos com páginas ilimitadas
  2. Gerar PDFs completos, sem nenhuma limitação


Ajude-nos doando

👉 Acesse a versão PRO


Contacte: breno.guerra@live.com
plugins.tagline: Export PDF and Links

plugins.name: It Counts Layers
plugins.description:
This plugin does one thing–it counts the layers in a Figma file. That's it.


The layer counts are broken down by page. It'll also count the number of layers in your selection. It doesn't do anything else.
plugins.tagline: That's what it does.

117073.description:

plugins.name: UX4G Theme Craft
plugins.description: UX4G Theme Builder empowers designers to create and customize government-compliant design systems effortlessly. Tailored for the Indian Government's UX4G initiative, this plugin simplifies theming, enabling you to generate color palettes, typography, and component styles that align with the UX4G Design System. Build visually consistent and user-friendly interfaces in minutes with our intuitive interface and robust customization options.

plugins.name: Sorted Random Text Generator
plugins.description:
Random text generation for tables and which can have sorting is difficult to generate. Not anymore.


Generate random text with rules & apply sorting to it.


Usage:

  2. Select a rule for random text (range of numbers, format, etc.)
  3. Select sorting (none, ascending, descending)
  4. Generate!

plugins.name: Atomic Design Components
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with our AI-powered component generator. Simply describe what you want in natural language, and watch as professional, consistent UI components come to life instantly.


Key Features:

• Generate complete UI components using simple text prompts

• Built on atomic design principles for maximum reusability

• Support for buttons, forms, inputs, navigation, and more

• Customizable colors, sizes, states, and properties

• Responsive and design system ready

• Premium features including unlimited generations


Perfect for design teams, UI/UX designers, and anyone building professional interfaces. Start with our free trial and generate up to 20 components!


Contact & Support:


GitHub Issues: Report bugs or request features on GitHub.


Email Support: Reach out directly at alexanderburgosuk82@gmail.com.

accepted.name: uxuiconexioncreativa
accepted.description: With more than 7 years of experience in user-centered web design and front-end development, I specialize in building  solutions for business.

plugins.tagline: Powered Atomic Design Components Generator - Create Beautiful UI Components with Natural Language

plugins.name: Stash Modes
plugins.description: This plugin enables you to "stash" variable modes within your Figma file. A stashed mode is essentially a copy of an existing mode. Although it is not directly accessible for pages and frames, you can later swap it back as a "real" mode. This feature proves handy when you want to experiment with different settings while preserving your original modes.
plugins.tagline: Save variable modes for later

78580.name: Stash Modes
78580.description: This plugin enables you to "stash" variable modes within your Figma file. A stashed mode is essentially a copy of an existing mode. Although it is not directly accessible for pages and frames, you can later swap it back as a "real" mode. This feature proves handy when you want to experiment with different settings while preserving your original modes.
78580.release_notes: Cosmetic changes and Bugfixes. After the Update it might be necessary to click reload once to see the stashed modes.

plugins.name: E-ImageCompression
plugins.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers — images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.
plugins.tagline: Optimize images in one click

137621.name: E-ImageCompression
137621.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers — images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin uses TinyPNG API for image compression. Since TinyPNG API doesn't support CORS directly, we use a CORS proxy (cors.siteceterum.ru) for secure API communication.

plugins.name: Pictomate Icons
plugins.description:
Precise, elegant, and consistent icons for designers


Pictomate is a Figma plugin that offers a carefully crafted set of SVG icons — designed for real products, design systems, and teams that care about clarity and consistency.


• Smart search

• Production-ready quality

• Distraction-free workflow


Whether you're building onboarding flows, dashboards, or pricing pages, these icons are made to just work - without visual noise or clutter.


New icon sets and improvements are on the way. Feel free to share feedback or suggestions!


For any questions or custom licensing needs, feel free to reach out: hello@pictomate.com


Created and maintained by Dominik Pacholczyk
plugins.tagline: Icons for designers who care. Precise, consistent, elegant.

plugins.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
plugins.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!

accepted.name: Muhammad Faizan Atiq
accepted.description: Hey there! I’m a design nerd with a big love for systems that turn ideas into magic. Every pixel counts, every pattern tells a story!

plugins.tagline: Arrange frames, add sections, and tidy your pages—fast

126526.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
126526.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!
126526.release_notes:
Release Notes v2.0.0

✨ New Features:
• Create sections with custom background colors
• Organize elements horizontally or vertically
• Adjust spacing and padding between elements
• Set maximum section width for better layout control

🛠️ Improvements:
• Sections are created exactly where you select elements
• Consistent spacing between rows in horizontal layout
• Smooth color picker with preset swatches
• Modern dark theme UI with glassmorphism effects

🐛 Fixed:
• Section positioning now matches native Figma behavior
• Color picker no longer gets cropped in the UI
• Layout spacing issues in multi-row sections
126526.tagline: Arrange frames, add sections, and tidy your pages—fast

plugins.name: Ugly Images
plugins.description:
Your design looks flawless, filled with perfect stock photos… but reality hits different. Users will upload poorly cropped pictures, badly lit selfies, and blurry screenshots. Ugly Images helps you design for the real world—where images are anything but perfect.


🔹 Fill your designs with truly awful images – See how your UI handles the chaos.

🔹 Forget pixel-perfect mockups – Apps rely on user-generated content.

🔹 Break free from the stock photo illusion – Prepare your UI for the unexpected.


Ready to see your design as it will actually look? Try it and embrace the ugly.
plugins.tagline: Mockups Lie. Ugly Images Don't

122612.description:

plugins.name: GPT To I18n
plugins.description:
GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。




一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。




我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。




如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。




一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。




当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。




所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！


GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!


GptToI18n是一款非常实用的插件工具！它不仅能够轻松地的一键生成i18n，还可以将设计稿瞬间转化为多种语言版本，让您轻松应对全球市场。


一键生成i18n json。这意味着您可以在不需要编写任何代码的情况下，自动将设计稿翻译成其他语言。这不仅可以节省您的时间和精力，还能提高工作效率。


我们推荐在草稿状态下完成，您只需要按住 ctrl + p 打开GptToI18n插件，选择您需要转换的范围和目标语言，然后点击获取JSON，只需要等待几秒就能完成 i18n JSON生成。可以看到的 Text name 也做了对应处理。


如果您需要将设计稿转换成目标语言版本，您只需要点击根据 JSON 翻译页面即可。


一键将设计稿转化为各种语言的版本。无论您的客户在世界的哪个角落，他们只需要打开您的设计稿，就可以立即理解您的产品。


当然，如果您没有输入OpenAi API 密钥，获取对应 JSON 需要消耗 tokens ，如果您有自己的OpenAi API 密钥，那么您可以尽情的使用。


所以，如果您是一个善于尝试新工具的人，那么GptToi18n绝对是一个不容错过的好选择。它不仅可以帮助您节省时间和精力，提高工作效率，还可以让您的产品更轻松地走进全球市场。快来试试吧，让它为您的工作带来更多的便利和成功！

GptToI18n is a very useful plugin tool! Not only can it easily generate i18n with one click, but it can also instantly convert designs into multiple language versions, so that you can easily respond to the global market.


Generate i18n json in one click. This means that you can automatically translate your designs into other languages without having to write any code. This will not only save you time and effort, but also improve your productivity.


We recommend that you finish in draft state, you just need to hold down ctrl + p to open the GptToI18n plugin, select the scope and target language you want to convert, and then click Get JSON, only need to wait a few seconds to complete the i18n JSON generation. The Text name that can be seen is also processed.


If you need to convert your design to the target language version, just click Translate Page from JSON.


Convert design drafts into various languages with one click. No matter where your customers are in the world, they just need to open your design manuscript and instantly understand your product.


Of course, if you do not enter the OpenAi API key, it will cost tokens to get the corresponding JSON, and if you have your own OpenAi API key, then you can use it as much as you like.


So, if you are someone who is good at trying out new tools, then GptToi18n is definitely a good choice not to be missed. It can not only help you save time and effort, improve work efficiency, but also make it easier for your products to enter the global market. Give it a try and let it bring more convenience and success to your work!

plugins.name: HYWD Style Unifier
plugins.description:
Unify style parameters throughout your figma layout for better design consistency. Convert your intuitively designed first layouts into propper yet highly effective design systems. Or just fix your final design with your existing styles. Find inconsistencies or unlinked elements easily. Swap themes or incorporate external components and adapt them to your local or global styles in a breeze.


Here is a quick intro video on what the plugin can do for you!


And here are video-tutorials on the 3 main use cases:


Best workflow for design system building


Best workflow for design linting


Best workflow for style matching



Get even more details on how to use the tool and a FREE trial license at our HAYWOOD Digital Tools online shop and the figma style unifier plugin product page!

plugins.name: Chromix – Color Scale Generator
plugins.description:
Tired of eyeballing your color scales?

Chromix gives you precision tools to generate stunning, contrast-compliant color ramps from any base color. Whether you're working in HEX, HSL, or OKLCH, Chromix helps you build beautiful palettes for modern UI design—fast.


Visualize your colors in action with real-time previews on sample UI components right inside the plugin—no more guesswork. Copy Tailwind-ready values, and export the color guide to your Figma workspace, and build scalable, accessible systems with confidence.

accepted.name: Chaitanya Vishrojwar
accepted.description:
Product Designer
Turning ideas into seamless experiences
One pixel at a time

plugins.tagline: The easiest way to craft beautiful, accessible color systems.

plugins.name: Randominator
plugins.description:
🎨 Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


✨ Features:


🎯 Transform Properties

• Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

• Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180° to 180°

• Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


🎨 Color Properties

• Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

• Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

• Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


📑 Layer Management

• Randomize layer stacking order

• Works with multiple selected objects

• Maintains object center positions


🔄 Perfect for:

• Creating design variations

• Generating unique patterns

• Exploring different color combinations

• Adding organic movement to your designs

• Quick prototyping and ideation


💡 Pro Tips:

• Select multiple objects to randomize them together

• Use small ranges for subtle variations

• Combine different properties for unique results

• Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups
plugins.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

132327.description:

💡 Pro Tips:

• Combine different properties for unique results

132327.release_notes:
🎉 New Update: Randominator v1.1.0

We're excited to bring you new randomization features to make your designs even more dynamic!

✨ New Features:
• Rotation Randomization: Add random rotation to your selected elements with customizable min/max angles
• Layer Order Randomization: Shuffle the stacking order of your selected layers for quick variations
• Improved Scale Behavior: More intuitive scaling with better default values

🛠️ UI Improvements:
• Updated interface layout for better usability
• Reset default color randomization values for more predictable results
• Enhanced slider controls for better precision

Try these new features by selecting multiple elements and adjusting the rotation range or enabling layer order randomization in the plugin panel.

Happy randomizing! 🎨
132327.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

plugins.name: Autolayout converter Helper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly locate frames and take control of your design exploration!!!


Navigate to complex Figma layers with ease! This plugin helps you traverse design hierarchies by stopping at frames and allowing you to decide the next move. Customize your search—pause anywhere and pick it up whenever you're ready (at that moment perform your change at layer✨ ). Perfect for designers and developers who need precise, targeted frame navigation.


Key Features :

  1. Start Search from Any Node : Begin traversal from any selected layer in your Figma file, drilling down through layers and frames.
  2. Stop on Frame Detection : Pauses at each frame, allowing you to review, edit, or proceed to the next frame.
  3. Customisable Navigation : Choose from Next to continue, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause as needed.


Use Cases :

  1. Designers and Developers : Streamline work on large, complex Figma files with multiple frames and layers.
  2. Efficient Frame Location : Locate frames quickly, without tedious manual scrolling.
  3. Auto Layout Validation : Essential for platforms or projects requiring strict auto layout adherence for accurate design and responsive outputs. This plugin helps ensure each frame aligns to the full auto layout setup, ensuring optimal structure and consistency.
  4. Flexible Layer Exploration : Customize your traversal to focus on only the layers that matter most for faster design reviews and targeted edits.


How to Use :

  1. Select your starting node in Figma, click Start, and let the plugin begin searching.
  2. When a layer is detected, choose Next to proceed, Skip to bypass children, or Custom Stop to pause where desired.


Boost productivity, stay organized, and manage complex Figma designs with this efficient layers finding plugin. Ideal for design reviews, auto layout validation, focused edits, and streamlined development workflows!
plugins.tagline: Navigate layers with ease: control traversal and reduce your manual drilling time by 40%

plugins.name: Collect Instances
plugins.description: The plugin generates a page that lists all instance duplications on the current page. If run with a selection, it duplicates instances within that selection and any instances from the same components.

plugins.name: Samenamer
plugins.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.
plugins.tagline: same name frame similar names mark same frames

50442.name: Samenamer
50442.description: This Figma plugin allows you to select and color all frames on the current page that share the same name as the frame you have currently selected. After selecting a frame, the plugin will scan the page for other frames with the same name and select them automatically. The selected frames will then be colored red to make them stand out. This can be useful for quickly identifying and grouping related design elements within a Figma file.

plugins.name: Stopwatch
plugins.description:
A simple stopwatch timer that counts up from zero and continuously updates your selected text layer in real time.

Great for prototyping timers, showing elapsed time, or just tracking activity in your design!


🔧 Features:

Live stopwatch with hh:mm:ss format

Start, Stop, and Reset controls

Automatically updates the selected text node in Figma

Lightweight and easy to use


📚 Instructions for Use

  1. Select a text layer in your Figma file
  2. Run the plugin: Plugins → Stopwatch Timer
  3. Click Start to begin counting up
  4. The time will update in your selected layer every second
  5. Use Stop to pause or Reset to clear the timer


📝 Note: Make sure the text node uses a single font like “Inter Semi Bold”. The plugin automatically loads the required font.
plugins.tagline: A simple stopwatch that updates your Figma layers in real time.

131490.name: Stopwatch
131490.description:
A simple stopwatch timer that counts up from zero and continuously updates your selected text layer in real time.

Great for prototyping timers, showing elapsed time, or just tracking activity in your design!

Automatically updates the selected text node in Figma

Lightweight and easy to use


📚 Instructions for Use

  2. Run the plugin: Plugins → Stopwatch Timer
  3. Click Start to begin counting up
  4. The time will update in your selected layer every second
  5. Use Stop to pause or Reset to clear the timer


📝 Note: Make sure the text node uses a single font like “Inter Semi Bold”. The plugin automatically loads the required font.
131490.tagline: A simple stopwatch that updates your Figma layers in real time.

plugins.name: Variables Cleaner
plugins.description: Variables Cleaner scans your selected Figma variable collection for orphaned string variables (those not referenced by any text layers) and shows you the total count. Preview and select which ones to remove, then clean up your file with a single click. Keep your designs tidy without hunting down dead string variables by hand!
plugins.tagline: Instantly find and remove unused string variables in Figma in one click.

131026.name: Variables Cleaner
131026.description: Variables Cleaner scans your selected Figma variable collection for orphaned string variables (those not referenced by any text layers) and shows you the total count. Preview and select which ones to remove, then clean up your file with a single click. Keep your designs tidy without hunting down dead string variables by hand!
131026.release_notes:
• Split progress reporting
Pages: “Scanning page X of N…” (scan-progress-pages)
Nodes: “Scanning node X of M…” (scan-progress-nodes)

• Crash fix on large files
Guard against missing variable references - unfound vars now render blank instead of throwing.
131026.tagline: Instantly find and remove unused string variables in Figma in one click.

plugins.name: Universal Design (beta)
plugins.description:
UDML Exporter for Figma (beta)


Transform your Figma designs into AI-ready UDML (Universal Design Markup Language) documents. UDML Exporter creates structured, semantic descriptions of your designs specifically optimized for AI interpretation and code generation.


AI-First Design Documentation


UDML is built from the ground up to be understood by AI. Instead of trying to directly convert designs to code (which often produces messy, unmaintainable results), UDML provides AI agents with:


  1. Semantic Structure: Clear representation of layout hierarchies and relationships
  2. Design Context: Comprehensive documentation of components and their usage
  3. Style System: Organized design tokens and variables
  4. Asset Catalog: Structured references to exported graphics and icons
  5. Rich Metadata: Layer names, descriptions, and relationships that AI can interpret


Why AI + UDML?


Traditional Figma-to-code tools try to guess what components you meant to create. UDML takes a different approach:


  1. Let AI Do the Heavy Lifting: Instead of making assumptions, provide AI with rich context
  2. Semantic Understanding: AI can interpret layer names and relationships to generate appropriate components
  3. Design System Integration: AI can map your design tokens to existing system variables
  4. Framework Flexibility: Generate code for any framework or library
  5. Open and Extensible: No locked-in formats or proprietary solutions


How It Works


  1. Design in Figma using Auto Layout and components
  2. Export to UDML (optimized for AI consumption)
  3. Provide the UDML to an AI agent (like Claude or Cursor)
  4. Get clean, semantic code that matches your design system


Example AI Interpretation


<!-- UDML Export -->
<column name="user-profile-card" gap="16px">
<image name="avatar" src="assets/user-avatar.png"/>
<text name="user-name" typography="heading-medium">John Doe</text>
<text name="user-title" typography="body-regular">Senior Designer</text>
</column>


AI might interpret this as:


<!-- React Interpretation -->
<UserCard>
<Avatar src={user.avatar} />
<Heading level={3}>{user.name}</Heading>
<Text>{user.title}</Text>
</UserCard>


Perfect For


  1. Designers who want AI to understand their work
  2. Developers who need intelligent code generation
  3. Teams building or maintaining design systems
  4. Anyone looking for an alternative to traditional Figma-to-code tools


Getting Started


  1. Install the plugin
  2. Design with AI interpretation in mind
  3. Export to UDML
  4. Let AI generate your code


Design for AI


To get the best results:

  1. Use clear, descriptive layer names
  2. Leverage Auto Layout for clear structure
  3. Create consistent component patterns
  4. Document your design system tokens


Join the AI-First Design Movement


UDML is an open specification for AI-friendly design documentation. Help shape the future of AI-assisted design-to-code workflows.


docs.universaldesign.ai
plugins.tagline: Figma to code, your way

plugins.description:
使用流程


快速将设计稿中的文本替换为目标语言，只需以下几步：


  1. 选中设计元素或画板 在Figma中，选中需要替换文本的设计元素或整个画板（提示：确保选中的元素包含需要替换的文本图层）
  2. 打开插件 在Figma顶部菜单栏中，点击“插件” > 搜索并打开“多国语言文本替换”（或通过快捷方式运行）
  3. 上传翻译文档 在插件界面中，点击“上传文件”按钮，选择你的 .xlsx 翻译文档。 注意：翻译文档需按照以下规范准备：
  4. 文档必须包含两列：第一列为源文本，第二列为目标文本。
  5. 默认列名：A1 为“源文本”（如“英语”），B1 为“目标文本”（如“阿拉伯语”）
  6. 输入源文本与目标文本列名 在插件界面的输入框中，输入或确认翻译文档中的源文本列名（例如“英语”）和目标文本列名（例如“阿拉伯语”）
  7. 点击“开始替换” 确认无误后，点击插件界面上的“开始替换”按钮。 插件会自动扫描选中的设计元素，匹配源文本并替换为目标文本，同时保持原始布局不变
  8. 查看替换结果
plugins.tagline: 语言文本替换工具

plugins.name: Best Font Picker 最好用的中文字体选择工具
plugins.description:
多语字体随心筛，映射编辑超丝滑

字体筛选「语言 + 类型」双管齐下，名称显示自由改超省心

字体筛选快准狠，映射编辑秒搞定

Freely filter multi - language fonts, and enjoy a super - smooth mapping and editing experience.

Font filtering combines "language + type" in a two - pronged approach, and you can freely change the name display, which is extremely worry - free.

Font filtering is fast, accurate, and decisive, and mapping and editing can be done in an instant.
plugins.tagline: Font Selection Master! Precise Handling of Chinese and Multilingual Font Display 字体选择神器！支持中文及多语言字体显示

plugins.name: Variable Search
plugins.description:
Figma's Variables previously couldn’t be searched directly, which made it difficult when managing multiple collections and numerous variables.

But now, with the variable search feature, you can easily find and edit variables!


If you encounter any issues while using the plugin or have feedback, feel free to reach out anytime.

contact: plustypo@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: You can find each collection by searching for its variable.

plugins.name: FontChanger by CreativeRafat
plugins.description: FontChanger is a powerful Figma plugin that converts all text fonts in your design into a dynamic font variable. Simply input your desired font, and FontChanger will update all text layers while maintaining flexibility through Figma’s typography system. Save time, stay consistent, and streamline your design workflow effortlessly!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly transform your Figma fonts with just one click!

122589.name: FontChanger by CreativeRafat
122589.description: FontChanger is a powerful Figma plugin that converts all text fonts in your design into a dynamic font variable. Simply input your desired font, and FontChanger will update all text layers while maintaining flexibility through Figma’s typography system. Save time, stay consistent, and streamline your design workflow effortlessly!
122589.tagline: Effortlessly transform your Figma fonts with just one click!

plugins.name: QR code Maker
plugins.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you generate customizable QR codes with ease. Change colors, add gradients, insert logos, and create unique designs—all while keeping it simple and user-friendly. Export your styled QR codes in high-quality PNG format and enhance your designs effortlessly!


Feature Suggestions:


Prototype QR Code Generator – generate QR codes that link to Figma prototypes, making it easier to share interactive designs with clients or teams.

Design Asset QR Codes – Allow users to generate QR codes that link to downloadable assets or design system documentation.

Social Media Links – Add options to create QR codes linking to social media profiles or portfolios directly from the design canvas.

Customizable Frames – Offer stylish frames or borders around QR codes to make them fit different design aesthetics.

Bulk QR Code Generation – Allow generating multiple QR codes at once for product packaging, business cards, or event badges.
plugins.tagline: Stylize & Export QR Codes – Your Way!

124705.name: QR code Maker
124705.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you generate customizable QR codes with ease. Change colors, add gradients, insert logos, and create unique designs—all while keeping it simple and user-friendly. Export your styled QR codes in high-quality PNG format and enhance your designs effortlessly!


Feature Suggestions:


Prototype QR Code Generator – generate QR codes that link to Figma prototypes, making it easier to share interactive designs with clients or teams.

Design Asset QR Codes – Allow users to generate QR codes that link to downloadable assets or design system documentation.

Social Media Links – Add options to create QR codes linking to social media profiles or portfolios directly from the design canvas.

Customizable Frames – Offer stylish frames or borders around QR codes to make them fit different design aesthetics.

Bulk QR Code Generation – Allow generating multiple QR codes at once for product packaging, business cards, or event badges.

124705.tagline: Stylize & Export QR Codes – Your Way!

plugins.name: Text Style Group Clone
plugins.description:
This simple plugin duplicates local text styles by hierarchy. It’s useful when creating multiple text styles, such as sans-serif and serif, or desktop and mobile variants.

Due to Figma API limitations, font settings such as Details and Variables are not copied.


登録されているテキストスタイルをグループごと複製するのプラグインです。

Figma APIで取得できないOpenType FeaturesやVariable設定はコピーできません。
plugins.tagline: Duplicate hierarchical text styles. (Only basic font settings are copied.)

120111.name: Text Style Group Clone
120111.description:
